title: Afghanistan v Zimbabwe in UAE 2018 Scoreboard
text: February 9, 2018 / 5:08 PM / Updated 23 minutes ago Afghanistan v Zimbabwe in UAE 2018 Scoreboard Reuters Staff 3 Min Read Feb 9 (OPTA) - Scoreboard at close of play of 1st odi between Afghanistan and Zimbabwe on Friday at Sharjah, United Arab Emirates Afghanistan win by 154 runs Afghanistan 1st innings Mohammad Shahzad c Brian Vitori b Graeme Cremer 36 Ihsanullah c Solomon Mire b Graeme Cremer 54 Rahmat Shah c Craig Ervine b Kyle Jarvis 114 Asghar Stanikzai c Tendai Chatara b Graeme Cremer 3 Nasir Jamal b Sikandar Raza 31 Najibullah Zadran Not Out 81 Extras 2b 1lb 5nb 0pen 6w 14 Total (50.0 overs) 333-5 Fall of Wickets : 1-90 Janat, 2-91 Mohammadi, 3-109 Stanikzai, 4-175 Ahmadzai, 5-333 Zurmatai Did Not Bat : Nabi, Naib, Khan, Zadran, Zadran Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Kyle Jarvis 9 0 77 1 8.56 1nb Brian Vitori 10 0 67 0 6.70 2w Sikandar Raza 10 0 58 1 5.80 Graeme Cremer 10 0 47 3 4.70 Tendai Chatara 8 2 63 0 7.88 4nb Ryan Burl 3 0 18 0 6.00 Zimbabwe 1st innings Hamilton Masakadza c Rahmat Shah b Mujeeb Zadran 16 Solomon Mire b Dawlat Zadran 34 Brendan Taylor c&b Mohammad Nabi 16 Craig Ervine b Mujeeb Zadran 33 Sikandar Raza c (Sub) b Gulbadin Naib 25 Ryan Burl lbw Rashid Khan 2 Malcolm Waller b Rashid Khan 0 Graeme Cremer lbw Rashid Khan 1 Kyle Jarvis c Gulbadin Naib b Rahmat Shah 20 Tendai Chatara Not Out 2 Brian Vitori b Rashid Khan 8 Extras 6b 1lb 0nb 0pen 15w 22 Total (34.4 overs) 179 all out Fall of Wickets : 1-50 Mire, 2-52 Masakadza, 3-78 Taylor, 4-114 Ervine, 5-128 Burl, 6-129 Waller, 7-135 Butt, 8-136 Cremer, 9-165 Jarvis, 10-179 Vitori Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Mujeeb Zadran 8 2 41 2 5.12 Dawlat Zadran 5 0 29 1 5.80 1w Mohammad Nabi 7 2 25 1 3.57 Gulbadin Naib 7 0 40 1 5.71 2w Rashid Khan 5.4 0 26 4 4.59 3w Rahmat Shah 2 0 11 1 5.50 1w Umpire Nigel Llong Umpire Ahmed Pakteen Video Bismillah Shinwari Match Referee Richard Richardson
